summary: Remember Potema the wolf queen, well now you too can sacrifice souls to the daedra
descriptionHtml:
This simple mod adds 3 new spells to the game they are, corrupt soulgem, sacrifice soul, and sacrifice spriggen soul

Corrupt soulgem will turn an empty grand soulgem into a black soulgem

Sacrifice soul will allow you to sacrifice a filled black soulgem to gain knowledge and power (perk points).

Sacrifice Spriggen soul will allow you to sacrifice taproots to gain magical power (+2 permanent magicka points per taproot offered).

The sacrifice soul and corrupt soulgem spell can be found in the lowest level of potema's catacombs or in anise's cabin basement the sacrifice spriggen soul spell can only be found at Anise's Cabin basement.

Simple yet great for roleplaying an evil mage or witch.

Update 1.1
Added Sacrifice Spriggen spell.
Changed spells to rituals and casting time to 6 seconds
Added adept conjurer perk for spells

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

"I am the Queen of Solitude, daughter of the Emperor! Summon the daedra! I'll trade the soul of every last subject of mine for a little comfort"
?Queen Potema, 3E 97
author: WildWitch
